displaytitle: Plaque with Hercules and the Hydra
medium: Bronze inlaid with copper, silver, and brass

texts.textentryhtml: Purchased from Mathias Komor, New York, in 1971.

caption: Roman, Roman Imperial Period (ca. 30 BCE–476 CE), Roman Empire, likely the Eastern Mediterranean, 4th century CE, Plaque with Hercules and the Hydra. Bronze inlaid with copper, silver, and brass; 18.8 x 9 cm. Museum purchase, Carl Otto von Kienbusch Jr., Memorial Collection Fund (y1971-35)
